Text: RE Telephone Interview with the Enron Corp Research Group Cc MrKaminski Mr Krishnarao and Mr Sezgen I was very pleased to have an wonderful telephone interview with you Its exciting and challenging I like it I talked to my financial engineering program classmate Bob Lee who was just hired by Enron recently He told me he is very impressed by your company and very excited to work there I believe Im a strong candidate for this position Id like to share more my background and experience with you I look forward to meeting you Thank you PS Thank Shirley for her coordinate work When I come to Houston I may need her help again Sincerely Jeff He
